problem_names:
lemma weakPsiCongSym:
  fixes \<Psi>  :: 'b
  and   P  :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Q  :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<doteq> P"

lemma weakPsiCongE:
  fixes \<Psi>   :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   \<Psi>'  :: 'b


  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<approx> Q"
  and   "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q"
  and   "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P"

lemma weakPsiCongI[case_names cWeakBisim cSimLeft cSimRight]:
  fixes \<Psi>  :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   \<Psi>' :: 'b

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<approx> Q"
  and     "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q"
  and     "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q"

lemma weakPsiCongSymI[consumes 1, case_names cSym cWeakBisim cSim]:
  fixes \<Psi>  :: 'b
  and   P   :: "'d::fs_name"
  and   Q   :: 'd
  and   \<Psi>' :: 'b

  assumes "Prop P Q"
  and     "\<And>P Q. Prop P Q \<Longrightarrow> Prop Q P"

  and     "\<And>P Q. Prop P Q \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<rhd> (C P) \<approx> (C Q)"

  and     "\<And>P Q. Prop P Q \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<rhd> (C P) \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> (C Q)"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> (C P) \<doteq> (C Q)"

lemma weakPsiCongSym2[consumes 1, case_names cWeakBisim cSim]:
  fixes \<Psi>  :: 'b
  and   \<Psi>' :: 'b

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q"

  and     "\<And>P Q. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<rhd> (C P) \<approx> (C Q)"

  and     "\<And>P Q. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<rhd> (C P) \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> (C Q)"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> (C P) \<doteq> (C Q)"

lemma statEqWeakCong:
  fixes \<Psi>  :: 'b
  and   P  :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Q  :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   \<Psi>' :: 'b
  
  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q"
  and     "\<Psi> \<simeq> \<Psi>'"

  shows "\<Psi>' \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q"

lemma weakPsiCongReflexive:
  fixes \<Psi> :: 'b
  and   P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"


  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> P"

lemma weakPsiCongClosed:
  fixes \<Psi> :: 'b
  and   P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Q :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   p :: "name prm"
  
  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q"

  shows "(p \<bullet> \<Psi>) \<rhd>  (p \<bullet> P) \<doteq> (p \<bullet> Q)"

lemma weakPsiCongTransitive:
  fixes \<Psi> :: 'b
  and   P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Q :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   R :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q"
  and     "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<doteq> R"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> R"

lemma strongBisimWeakPsiCong:
  fixes \<Psi> :: 'b
  and   P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Q :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<sim> Q"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q"

lemma structCongWeakPsiCong:
  fixes P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Q :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"

  assumes "P \<equiv>\<^sub>s Q"

  shows "P \<doteq> Q"
translations:
lemma weakPsiCongSym:
  fixes \<Psi>  :: 'b
  and   P  :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Q  :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<doteq> P"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<doteq> P

lemma weakPsiCongE:
  fixes \<Psi>   :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   \<Psi>'  :: 'b


  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<approx> Q"
  and   "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q"
  and   "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<approx> Q &&&
    \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q &&&
    \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<approx> Q &&&
    \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q &&&
    \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P

lemma weakPsiCongI[case_names cWeakBisim cSimLeft cSimRight]:
  fixes \<Psi>  :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   \<Psi>' :: 'b

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<approx> Q"
  and     "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q"
  and     "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<approx> Q
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> Q
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> P

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q

lemma weakPsiCongSymI[consumes 1, case_names cSym cWeakBisim cSim]:
  fixes \<Psi>  :: 'b
  and   P   :: "'d::fs_name"
  and   Q   :: 'd
  and   \<Psi>' :: 'b

  assumes "Prop P Q"
  and     "\<And>P Q. Prop P Q \<Longrightarrow> Prop Q P"

  and     "\<And>P Q. Prop P Q \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<rhd> (C P) \<approx> (C Q)"

  and     "\<And>P Q. Prop P Q \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<rhd> (C P) \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> (C Q)"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> (C P) \<doteq> (C Q)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> C P \<doteq> C Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  Prop P Q
  Prop ?P ?Q \<Longrightarrow> Prop ?Q ?P
  Prop ?P ?Q \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<rhd> C ?P \<approx> C ?Q
  Prop ?P ?Q \<Longrightarrow>
  \<Psi> \<rhd> C ?P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> C
                                     ?Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> C P \<doteq> C Q

lemma weakPsiCongSym2[consumes 1, case_names cWeakBisim cSim]:
  fixes \<Psi>  :: 'b
  and   \<Psi>' :: 'b

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q"

  and     "\<And>P Q. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<rhd> (C P) \<approx> (C Q)"

  and     "\<And>P Q. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<rhd> (C P) \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> (C Q)"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> (C P) \<doteq> (C Q)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> C P \<doteq> C Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q
  \<Psi> \<rhd> ?P \<doteq> ?Q \<Longrightarrow>
  \<Psi> \<rhd> C ?P \<approx> C ?Q
  \<Psi> \<rhd> ?P \<doteq> ?Q \<Longrightarrow>
  \<Psi> \<rhd> C ?P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> C
                                     ?Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> C P \<doteq> C Q

proof (prove)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q;
     \<And>P Q.
        \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
        \<Psi> \<rhd> C P \<approx> C Q;
     \<And>P Q.
        \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
        \<Psi> \<rhd> C P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> C
    Q\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> ?Prop5 P Q
 2. \<And>Pa Qa.
       \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q;
        \<And>P Q.
           \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
           \<Psi> \<rhd> C P \<approx> C Q;
        \<And>P Q.
           \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
           \<Psi> \<rhd> C P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> C
       Q;
        ?Prop5 Pa Qa\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ?Prop5 Qa Pa
 3. \<And>Pa Qa.
       \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q;
        \<And>P Q.
           \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
           \<Psi> \<rhd> C P \<approx> C Q;
        \<And>P Q.
           \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
           \<Psi> \<rhd> C P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> C
       Q;
        ?Prop5 Pa Qa\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<rhd> C Pa \<approx> C Qa
 4. \<And>Pa Qa.
       \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q;
        \<And>P Q.
           \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
           \<Psi> \<rhd> C P \<approx> C Q;
        \<And>P Q.
           \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
           \<Psi> \<rhd> C P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> C
       Q;
        ?Prop5 Pa Qa\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<rhd> C
  Pa \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> C Qa

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>Pa Qa.
       \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q;
        \<And>P Q.
           \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
           \<Psi> \<rhd> C P \<approx> C Q;
        \<And>P Q.
           \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
           \<Psi> \<rhd> C P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> C
       Q;
        \<Psi> \<rhd> Pa \<doteq> Qa\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<rhd> Qa \<doteq> Pa
 2. \<And>Pa Qa.
       \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q;
        \<And>P Q.
           \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
           \<Psi> \<rhd> C P \<approx> C Q;
        \<And>P Q.
           \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
           \<Psi> \<rhd> C P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> C
       Q;
        \<Psi> \<rhd> Pa \<doteq> Qa\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<rhd> C Pa \<approx> C Qa
 3. \<And>Pa Qa.
       \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q;
        \<And>P Q.
           \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
           \<Psi> \<rhd> C P \<approx> C Q;
        \<And>P Q.
           \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
           \<Psi> \<rhd> C P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> C
       Q;
        \<Psi> \<rhd> Pa \<doteq> Qa\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<rhd> C
  Pa \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> C Qa
by(auto simp add: weakPsiCongruence_def dest: weakBisimE)

lemma statEqWeakCong:
  fixes \<Psi>  :: 'b
  and   P  :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Q  :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   \<Psi>' :: 'b
  
  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q"
  and     "\<Psi> \<simeq> \<Psi>'"

  shows "\<Psi>' \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q
  \<Psi> \<simeq> \<Psi>'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<and> \<Psi> \<simeq> \<Psi>'

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<and> \<Psi> \<simeq> \<Psi>'

proof (state)

lemma weakPsiCongReflexive:
  fixes \<Psi> :: 'b
  and   P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"


  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> P"

lemma weakPsiCongClosed:
  fixes \<Psi> :: 'b
  and   P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Q :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   p :: "name prm"
  
  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q"

  shows "(p \<bullet> \<Psi>) \<rhd>  (p \<bullet> P) \<doteq> (p \<bullet> Q)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet> P \<doteq> p \<bullet> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet> P \<doteq> p \<bullet> Q

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<doteq> P
 2. \<And>P Q.
       \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       p \<bullet> \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet> P \<approx> p \<bullet> Q
 3. \<And>P Q.
       \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       p \<bullet>
       \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet>
                     P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>weakBisim\<guillemotright> p \<bullet>
Q

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q

goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<doteq> P
 2. \<And>P Q.
       \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       p \<bullet> \<Psi> \<rhd> p \<bullet> P \<approx> p \<bullet> Q
 3. \<And>P Q.
       \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> Q \<Longrightarrow>

  and     "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<doteq> R"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<doteq> R"

  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<sim> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<sim> Q \<Longrightarrow>
       \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<approx> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<sim> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<approx> Q

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<approx> Q

goal:
No subgoals!

lemma structCongWeakPsiCong:
  fixes P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Q :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"

  assumes "P \<equiv>\<^sub>s Q"

  shows "P \<doteq> Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<equiv>\<^sub>s Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<doteq> Q
